title: The google searching bar on the background has been stopped to access
content:
When I enter the google searching bar on the wall, it said "Google keeps stopping."
I also can't access to assistance as well.
So I updated all the system and app, restarted the device many times, followed the instruction on the internet, but it doesn't work.
Should I have to reset or just wait?
I don't remember because it was to fast to read, I think I read the message means 'it's hard to access google right now in Korea" something like that.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
